    • Nightly Build Results

    Every day, the main Cactus build is run, the cactus jars are generated, the full suite of tests is executed and a nightly cactus distribution is packaged. This is possible thanks to GUMP.

    Please find below the links to the Cactus Nightly Build results :

    Name  
    Cactus Ant tasks  
    Cactus Framework for J2EE 1.2 (Servlet API 2.2)  
    Cactus Framework for J2EE 1.3 (Servlet API 2.3)  
    Cactus Servlet Sample for J2EE 1.2 (Servlet API 2.2)  
    Cactus Servlet Sample for J2EE 1.3 (Servlet API 2.3)  
    Cactus Distribution for J2EE 1.2 (Servlet API 2.2)  
    Cactus Distribution for J2EE 1.3 (Servlet API 2.3)  

    All Gump results are available here.


    Nightly Build results

    If the nightly build is successful, Gump posts the packaged Cactus distributable in the Cactus nightly download area.

    However it is also possible to get the different jars (unpackaged) from Gump here.

    In addition, it is possible to see the documentation (javadoc, website) generated during Gump build here.
